original_title: ECW The Night The Line Was Crossed
overview: Terry Funk puts the ECW Heavyweight Championship on the line against Shane Douglas and Sabu in a Three-Way Dance. There are no rules when Public Enemy takes on The Bruise Brothers. The Sandman and Tommy Cairo battle Rockin' Rebel and The Pitbull in a Double Dog Collar Chain Tag Team Match. Plus, Kevin Sullivan, 911, and many more are in action!
title: ECW The Night The Line Was Crossed
